### Discussion of legal issues
Are we liable if users from gambling-banned countries access the service?
Possible solutions:
- Make your own LLCs on smart contracts: https://otoco.io/
- Gaming/gambling lawyers/counselors
- Lawyer Friend of Patrik might guide us.  
- 
List of Gaming Lawyers: https://www.martindale.com/gaming-law-lawyers/vancouver/british-columbia/?

### Hydra in October, maybe
Charles Hoskinson on one of his last videos said he wants Hydra out on mainnet by Oct 2022. 
Maybe we could set oct 2022 as mainnet launch (given hydra)?
